name: Rolling Bear
description:
A small poetic game about eating and rolling, and being a bear in the making.

Made for the Buddy Up Jam: Winter 2022.

_Credits_

Narrative & Game Design: stipes - Rebecka Pettersson  & xanhisam - Xan

Code:  tiger - Tiger 

Audio: indigoBel - Ellen Kate Malpas

3D Art & Production: thebrokenbird - Ivette Schmidt
